item.title: Report E-2023080923
item.description:
Report E-2023080923

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-05T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 16, 2023, one (1) 330-gallon tote of UN1866 leaked approximately one-quarter of a gallon (.25) to the dock floor due to a faulty seam. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel utilized absorbent pads to remediate the spill and tightened the seam. All UN1866-impacted material was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
